comment.text: The translation key "ShareAndCollect" is used to describe a feature that allows users to share and collect files. It appears in a header component of a file explorer, typically seen on buttons or labels, prompting users to select files for sharing or collecting.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While '共有' (kyouyuu) means 'share' and '収集' (shuushuu) means 'collect', the ampersand (&) is not commonly used in Japanese for joining concepts like this. It would be more natural to use 'および' (oshi) or simply separate the words with a space.
The ampersand (&) is unusual in Japanese text. Using 'および' or a space is more standard for combining words.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 共有 および 収集

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Подели и прикупи" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Share & collect". "Прикупи" implies purchasing or acquiring something in addition to sharing. "Share & collect" suggests sharing something and then gathering or amassing it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like "Подели и сабери" (Podeli i saberī) or "Подели и скупи" (Podeli i skupī), which better represent the act of sharing and collecting.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "共享和收集" is a literal translation of "Share & collect", it doesn't fully capture the brevity and conciseness of the original. It sounds somewhat formal and clunky in Chinese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "分享与收集" (fenxiang yu shouji) or “分享收集” (fenxiang shouji) which are more natural and compact, retaining the original meaning.
